description.en: A member of the Forest Owls fighting for Timber's independence. She becomes involved in the battle with the sorceress after hiring SeeD to help abduct the president of the state occupying Timber. Daring and amiable、 she is a woman of action able to make friends with anyone.
description.jp:
レジスタンス組織「森のフクロウ」で
ティンバー独立を目指す少女。
占領国の大統領を誘拐する計画のため
SeeDの派遣を頼んだことをきっかけに
魔女との戦いに巻き込まれていく。
物怖じしない大胆さと人懐っこさで
どんな相手とも打ち解けられる行動派。

jp.text: 私のことが好きにな〜る、好きにな〜る
みんなに誤解されちゃうねえ
スコール！ いっしょに帰ろうよ！

gl.text: I mean、 everyone might、 y'know、 get the wrong idea about us.

desc.en: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 遠距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
Ranged BRV + HP attack
Grants [Angelo Recover] for 3 turns
Dispels [Angel Wing] effect

While [Angelo Recover] is active:
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+ (Angelo)]
　∟ Ranged BRV attack
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+ (Angelo)]
　∟ Raises BRV based on Max BRV before inflicting an HP attack

[Angelo Recover] grants [BRV Regen] and [HP Regen] effects
desc.gl:
Ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Self: 3 turns Angelo Recover
Cancels special effect Angel Wing
While Angelo Recover active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Angelo)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Angelo)
desc.jp:
遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
自身に3ACTION「アンジェロリカバー」付与
特殊効果「ヴァリー」解除
「アンジェロリカバー」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「BRV攻撃＋（アンジェロ）」に
通常「HP攻撃」が「HP攻撃＋（アンジェロ）」に変化

desc.jp: アンジェロリカバー：HP・BRVを一定量回復する

desc.en:
No action delay
Grants [Angel Wing] effect for 3 turns
Dispels [Angelo Recover]
Does not increase turn count
Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

While [Angel Wing] effect is active:
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing)]
　∟ 5-HIT magic BRV attack
　∟ Slightly consumes HP
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)]
　∟ 3-HIT magic BRV + HP attack
　∟ Slightly consumes HP
• Moderately raises Max BRV and greatly raises Attack
• Greatly lowers Defense
desc.gl:
Instant turn rate
Self: 3 turns special effect Angel Wing
Cancels Angelo Recover
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
While special effect Angel Wing active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV, largely raises ATK
 • Largely lowers DEF
desc.jp:
行動負荷がない
自身に3ACTION特殊効果「ヴァリー」付与
「アンジェロリカバー」解除
総ACTION数に加算されない
召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される
特殊効果「ヴァリー」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「BRV攻撃＋（ヴァリー）」に
通常「HP攻撃」が「HP攻撃＋（ヴァリー）」に変化
また自身の最大BRV中アップと攻撃力大アップし
防御力大ダウンする

奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
使用時に自身のHPを小消費

desc.en:
3-HIT AoE magic BRV + HP attack triggered thrice
BRV hits are dispersed when there are multiple enemies
HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
Grants [Angel Wing] effect for 3 turns
Dispels [Angelo Recover]
desc.gl:
3-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times
BRV attacks distributed based on number of enemies
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns special effect Angel Wing
Cancels Angelo Recover
While special effect Angel Wing active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV, largely raises ATK
 • Largely lowers DEF
desc.jp:
全体3HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を3回行う
敵の数に応じてBRV攻撃対象は分散
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に3ACTION特殊効果「ヴァリー」付与
「アンジェロリカバー」解除
特殊効果「ヴァリー」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「BRV攻撃＋（ヴァリー）」に
通常「HP攻撃」が「HP攻撃＋（ヴァリー）」に変化
また自身の最大BRV中アップと攻撃力大アップし
防御力大ダウンする

desc.en:
[Angelo Cannon] use +2

When using [Angelo Cannon]:
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt (limit 20% Max HP)

While [Angelo Recover] is active:
• Moderately raises allies' Max BRV and Attack

When using [BRV Attack+ (Angelo)]:
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Moderately raises total BRV potency

When using [HP Attack+ (Angelo)]:
• Slightly raises BRV gain based on Max BRV
• ranged BRV attack + HP attack
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Raises party BRV based on HP damage dealt
